name: Moon Nymph
description: The Moon Nymph is a striking aberration with exceptional charisma and dexterous maneuvers. Elusive in nature, it can become invisible and dominate the battlefield with its potent psychic and radiant abilities.
memorable: Its ability to stun opponents and create hallucinations makes the Moon Nymph a fearsome foe.
goals: To manipulate and dominate foes through stealth and psychological warfare.
relations: Other aberrations, creatures that rely on stealth or magic.
environment: Typically found in areas of strong magical influence or darkness.
strengths: Possesses magic resistance, allowing it to effectively resist spells, and has a strong combination of psychic and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Low physical strength, limitations in melee combat due to its reliance on magic.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with Beguiling Touch for psychic damage or Moonbeam for radiant damage, both causing debilitating effects.
most_powerful_ability: Veil of Nightmares creates fear and inflicts significant psychic damage on nearby foes.
senses: The Moon Nymph has a passive Perception of 15.
skills: It has notable proficiencies in Perception, Persuasion, and Stealth, making it effective in both combat and social situations.
additional_information: Resistant to necrotic and radiant damage.
Can only be seen normally in dim light when invisible.
Elusive combat style favors aerial mobility and evasiveness.
Chaos-driven tactics focus on manipulating foes' perceptions and actions.
test_queries: stealthy creature that inflicts psychic damage
aerial monster that uses illusions in battle
chaotic nymph with magic resistance and mind tricks
psychic abuser that can stun opponents
monster that becomes invisible in light
